TopicTitle: Tourist missions in hitchhiker storage container?

Articles.Content: I'm wondering if I can send 4 kerbals up in orbit to complete sub orbital and orbital tourist missions, using the Hitchhiker storage container. Would be really helpful, if not, i have to build something else.
Yes, but you will still need a means to pilot them up there, be it command pod or probe core. The hitchhiker storage is not a flight control module.

Yes, thank you both, here's my orbital taxi, a 9 ton craft:

[![screenshot3_zpsjjkew2co.png](http://i67.photobucket.com/albums/h313/Zamolxes77/screenshot3_zpsjjkew2co.png)](http://s67.photobucket.com/user/Zamolxes77/media/screenshot3_zpsjjkew2co.png.html)
